text: Meghana Lokesh (born 16 August 1994) is an Indian actress. She has worked on Telugu and Kannada television shows including Sasirekha Parinayam and Purushottama. She is currently acting in Kalyana Vaibhogam and Kalyanam Kamaneeyam on Zee Telugu. She also appeared in movie named Idhi Maa Prema Katha opposite Telugu Anchor Ravi. ==Early life== Meghana Lokesh was born on 16 August 1994 in Mysore, Karnataka, India. Her father is an engineer and her mother is a Kannada language teacher. She has one older brother named Nitin Lokesh, who is also an engineer. Meghana started acting in theatre when she was just 8 years old. She acted in more than 270 stage plays. She learned acting under a well-known theatre director named Mandya Ramesh. As a child, Meghana wanted to become a chemistry lecturer. But later, she chose acting as her career. She first appeared on Kannada television in a supporting role in the show Devi. Later, she played lead roles in shows like Pavitra Bandhana and Purushottama. == Filmography == === Television === * Devi(2012) (Kannada Debut Serial) *Pavitra Bandhan(2013) * Purushottama (2013) * Sasirekha Parinayam (2013-16) * Kalyana Vaibhogam (2017-Present) * Raktha Sambandham (2018-Present) * Kalyanam Kamaneeyam (2022-Present) === Movies === *Idhi Maa Prema Katha (2017) *Ameerpet 2 America (2018) ==Other websites== * ==References== Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Karnataka Category:1994 births Category:Living people
title: Meghana Lokesh
